subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following is NOT a capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के निम्नलिखित में एक राजस्थान के एक नहीं है।
explanation_en:
Chittor was never a capital of Rajasthan.
Note: This question is based on historical facts, as Chittor was never the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the first chief minister of Rajasthan after Indian independence?
question_hi: भारती के बार्ती (संघर्षण) ke baad, Rajasthan mein पहली राजधाना कौन था?
explanation_en:
Bhairon Singh Shekhawat was the first chief minister of Rajasthan after independence.
Note: Some sources mention Sardar Shankar Singh or Sardar Kalyan Singh as well, but Bhairon Singh Shekhawat is the most commonly accepted choice.
explanation_hi: बहीर सिंग शेखावत राजस्थान के संतुल वर्ग क्लुएट

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the first university established after India's independence?
question_hi: भारत के अंगना में पहली विश्वविद्याचार्याचार
explanation_en: After independence, the University of Rajasthan (राजस्थान विश्वविद्याचार) was established.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family from Rajasthan was associated with the famous Ranthambore Fort?
explanation_en: Kalyankar family was associated with the famous Ranthambore Fort.
